  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

);

  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  workout_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  duration INTERVAL
);

  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

);

  exercise_id UUID REFERENCES exercises(id),
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  sets INT,
  reps INT
);

  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  workout_id UUID REFERENCES workouts(id),
  exercise_id UUID REFERENCES exercises(id),
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  sets INT,
  reps INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT
);

  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  exercise_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  muscle_group VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL

  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,

  user_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
  workout_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  duration INTERVAL
);

    gender VARCHAR(10),

);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target INT,
    deadline DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);</t><stat>TRUNCATE TABLE users;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE users (

CREATE TABLE workouts (

    activity_id INT NOT NULL,

    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,

);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE goals (

    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,

);

    goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target INT,
    deadline DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,

    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,

    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

    date DATE NOT NULL,

);

    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

);

    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target INT,
    deadline DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);</t><stat>TRUNCATE TABLE workouts;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target INT,
    deadline DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);

    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);</t><stat>truncate table workouts;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    goal_id INT NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (goal_id) REFERENCES goals(goal_id)
);

CREATE TABLE goals (
    goal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    goal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    target INT,
    deadline DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    completed BOOLEAN NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
    activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    difficulty_level INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE workouts (
    workout_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    activity_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL,
    calories_burned INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (activity_id) REFERENCES activities(activity_id)
);</t><stat>TRUNCATE TABLE workouts;</stat><divider><t>CREATE TABLE progress (
